description: IC / Testnet health overview, with filtering drill-down links to detail dashboards

panels.description:
Alert history for _**$ic**_.

* *green* - not firing
* *yellow* - firing, `severity="info"`
* *orange* - firing, `severity="ticket"`
* *red* - firing, `severity="page"`

targets.expr:
# Alerts with a `dc` label (but no `ic_subnet` or `instance` labels).
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
sum without (severity, alertstate) (
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc=~"$dc",ic_subnet="",instance="",alertstate="firing",severity="page"}[$__interval]) * 3
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc=~"$dc",ic_subnet="",instance="",alertstate="firing",severity="ticket"}[$__interval]) * 2
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc=~"$dc",ic_subnet="",instance="",alertstate="firing",severity="info"}[$__interval]) * 1
    or
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc=~"$dc",ic_subnet="",instance="",alertstate="firing"}[$__interval] offset $__interval) * 0
),
"__name__", "$1 ", "alertname", "(.*)"),
"alertname", "", "alertname", ".*"),
"ic", "", "ic", ".*"),
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"ic_node", "$1", "ic_node", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"instance", "$1...$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?:[0-9]+)")

# Alerts with matching `ic_subnet` label and `instance` label matching both `$dc` and `$instance`. Or with no/empty `ic_subnet` or `instance` label if the respective variable value is "All".
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
sum without (severity, alertstate) (
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing",severity="page"}[$__interval]) * 3
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing",severity="ticket"}[$__interval]) * 2
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing",severity="info"}[$__interval]) * 1
    or
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing"}[$__interval] offset $__interval) * 0
),
"__name__", "$1 ", "alertname", "(.*)"),
"alertname", "", "alertname", ".*"),
"ic", "", "ic", ".*"),
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"ic_node", "$1", "ic_node", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"instance", "$1...$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?:[0-9]+)")

# Alerts for the same `instance_host` (but different `instance`). Works, but it's heavy and won't match the `host_node_exporter` instance (because it has a different IP address).
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
sum without (severity, alertstate) (
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance!~"$instance",instance=~"($instance_host).*",alertstate="firing",severity="page"}[$__interval]) * 3
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance!~"$instance",instance=~"($instance_host).*",alertstate="firing",severity="ticket"}[$__interval]) * 2
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance!~"$instance",instance=~"($instance_host).*",alertstate="firing",severity="info"}[$__interval]) * 1
    or
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",dc="",instance=~"|\\[?$dc:.*",instance!~"$instance",instance=~"($instance_host).*",alertstate="firing"}[$__interval] offset $__interval) * 0
),
"__name__", "$1 ", "alertname", "(.*)"),
"alertname", "", "alertname", ".*"),
"ic", "", "ic", ".*"),
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"ic_node", "$1", "ic_node", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"instance", "$1...$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?:[0-9]+)")

panels.title: IC Alerts

panels.description:
Running replicas, by subnet.

Replica restarts are indicated by white bars. A gap in the number of running replicas not ending in a white bar indicates a failure to collect metrics rather than a restart.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
  count_values by(ic_subnet) (
    "health",
      avg_over_time(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period])
    - on(instance, ic_subnet) 
      avg_over_time(certification_last_certified_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
    < bool
      10
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
  "health", "behind", "health", "0"),
  "health", "healthy", "health", "1"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
  count_values by(ic_subnet) (
    "health",
      avg_over_time(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period])
    - on(instance, ic_subnet) 
      avg_over_time(certification_last_certified_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
    < bool
      10
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
  "health", "behind", "health", "0"),
  "health", "healthy", "health", "1"
)

panels.title: Running Replicas

panels.description: Finalization rate (blocks / second) per instance, averaged over **$period**. And certified height per subnet.
panels.title: Finalization Rate

panels.description: Median messages executed per second by message type, averaged over **$period**
panels.title: Message Execution Rate, by Type

panels.description:
End-to-end ingress message latency, from block maker to certification.

* *Artifact pool*: mean time before the message makes it into a block, estimated as the time required to consume the ingress + XNet artifact pools (given block size limit and block rate).
* *Consensus*: interval at which batches are delivered to Message Routing.
* *Induction*: block queuing time between Consensus and Message Routing; difference between measured duration from block making to induction and *Consensus* above.
* *Ingress queue*: mean time spent by messages in the ingress queue of the average (i.e. median) canister.
* *Processing*: DSM round duration.
* *Certification*: time to certify the state root hash; difference between execution (max resident) height and certification (last certified) height, times DSM round duration.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    quantile without(ic_node, instance) (
        0.5,
            clamp_min(
                (
                        max_over_time(xnet_pool_size_bytes{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
                    + on(instance) group_left
                        max_over_time(artifact_pool_artifact_bytes{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",pool="ingress",pool_type="validated"}[$period])
                )
                / (4 * 2^20)
                - 1,
                0
            )
        /
            rate(mr_process_batch_duration_seconds_count{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"}[$__range])
    ),
    "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: End-to-End Latency

panels.description:
CPU time spent by the Deterministic State Machine in each phase (induction, execution, commit, message routing) of processing a round.

Execution is further broken down into sub-phases. And (message) and (thread) execution times are overlaid, as they are multithreaded.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  quantile by (ic, ic_subnet, phase) (
    0.5,
        rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",phase="execution"}[$period])
      / ignoring(phase) group_left
        rate(mr_process_batch_duration_seconds_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

label_replace(
  quantile by (ic, ic_subnet, phase) (
    0.5,
      clamp_min(
          sum without(phase) (rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",phase="execution"}[$period]))
        -
          (
              rate(execution_round_preparation_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
            +
              rate(execution_round_consensus_queue_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
            +
              rate(execution_round_advance_long_install_code_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
            +
              rate(execution_round_scheduling_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
            +
              rate(execution_round_inner_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
            +
              rate(execution_round_finalization_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
          ),
        0
      )
    /
      rate(mr_process_batch_duration_seconds_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

label_replace(
  quantile by (ic, ic_subnet, phase) (
    0.5,
      rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",phase!="execution"}[$period])
    / ignoring(phase) group_left
      rate(mr_process_batch_duration_seconds_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: Deterministic State Machine Round Duration

panels.description: Sum of per-subnet median messages enqueued in incoming queues (above zero) and outgoing streams (below).
panels.title: Enqueued Messages

panels.description: Subnet messages inducted per second by  status, averaged over **$period**.
panels.title: Message Induction Rate

panels.description: HTTP requests per second across all instances, by type and status, averaged over **$period**
panels.title: HTTP Request Rate, by Type and Status

panels.description: Replica execution progress (compared to the per-subnet median), averaged over **$period**.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
    # Max resident height delta.
    (
        predict_linear(state_manager_max_resident_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"\\[?$dc:.*",instance=~"$instance"}[$period], 0)
      - on(ic_subnet) group_left
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (
          0.5,
            predict_linear(state_manager_max_resident_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"}[$period], 0)
          and
            # Filter out replica restarts (when the block height jumps from zero).
            min_over_time(state_manager_max_resident_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"}[$period]) != 0
        )
    )
  / on(ic_subnet) group_left
    # Times execution interval.
    quantile by(ic_subnet) (
      0.5,
      rate(state_manager_max_resident_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"}[$period])
    )
  and
    # Filter out replica restarts (when the block height jumps from zero).
    min_over_time(state_manager_max_resident_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"}[$period]) != 0
  and
    # Filter out artifacts of predict_linear when the metric has gone.
    state_manager_max_resident_height{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"},
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "\\[(\\w+):.+:(\\w+)\\].*"),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "(\\w+)-.+"
)

panels.title: Relative DSM Progress

panels.description: Gossip median received unvalidated bytes (above zero, left Y axis) and artifacts (below, right Y axis) across instances by pool, averaged over **$period**
panels.title: Gossip Received
